Counting data in the Supplemental table for the manuscript

```{r}
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
Supplemental_Table_1 <- read.delim("~/GitHub/Ct_MAP_analysis/Supplemental_Table_1.txt")
```

```{r}
Supplemental_Table_1 %>% 
  group_by(fastBAPS.clade,ompA.genotype) %>%
  summarize(count = n())
```

```{r}
Supplemental_Table_1 %>% 
  group_by(fastBAPS.clade,plasmid.genotype) %>%
  summarize(count = n())
```

```{r}
Supplemental_Table_1 %>%
  filter(plasmid.genotype == "E" & fastBAPS.clade == 4)
  
```
```{r}
Supplemental_Table_1 %>%
  filter(plasmid.genotype == "G" & fastBAPS.clade == 5)
```
